rule.condition: not (same(resolution in $L.file, NULL)) and same(resolution in $L.file.save, NULL)
rule.conditionDesc: ( resolution in CurrentRecord != NULL AND resolution in SavedRecord = NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Solution">resolution</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Solution">resolution</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Status via JavaScript (when ( Solution in CurrentRecord != NULL AND Solution in SavedRecord = NULL))
